description: This smart alarm clock application can be accessed with your mobile phone via the built-in web interface to set the alarm time, displays live weather data on the LCD, and keeps track of how long it takes you to wake up each morning, using cloud-based data storage.
title: Alarm Clock
tooltip: This smart alarm clock application can be accessed with your mobile phone via the built-in web interface to set the alarm time, displays live weather data on the LCD, and keeps track of how long it takes you to wake up each morning, using cloud-based data storage.
